channel.title: [RESOLVED] Adept - help me!
channel.description:
I just got Kubuntu installed and i have a prob:
I want to install mozilla firefox and thunderbird but i get this message:
[code] Adept package manager:
READ ONLY MODE DATABASE LOCKED
You will not be able to change your system settings in any way because another process is using the packaging system. [/code]
I didn't start any other adept stuff and it still fails..
Please help me!!!
FIXED: [code] sudo dpkg --configure -a [/code]

item.title: [RESOLVED] Adept - help me!
item.dc:creator: @nicatron nicatron
item.description:
@nicatron wrote:

I just got Kubuntu installed and i have a prob:

I want to install mozilla firefox and thunderbird but i get this message:

Adept package manager:

READ ONLY MODE
DATABASE LOCKED

You will not be able to change your system settings in any way because another process is using the packaging system.

I didn’t start any other adept stuff and it still fails…

Please help me!!!

FIXED:

sudo dpkg --configure -a
